title: H002: Complete CI Pipeline & Coverage
description: Extend .github/workflows/ci.yaml with full job matrix: lint, test (unit + integration per operator), E2E (kind + Chainsaw), build-and-push (docker + GHCR on main/tags), helm-push (OCI registry on main/tags). Tag-triggered builds produce versioned images, charts, and GitHub Release. Configure .codecov.yml with thresholds: 80%+ for internal/common/, 70%+ for operator controllers, 90%+ for webhooks.
